typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		STORE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_COUNTRY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STATE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_CITY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NUMBER as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_TYPE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ZIP as string,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		STORE_COUNTRY as string,
		STORE_COUNTY as string,
		STORE_STATE as string,
		STORE_CITY as string,
		STORE_STREET_NUMBER as string,
		STORE_STREET_NAME as string,
		STORE_ZIP as string,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES as string,
		WORKING_HOURS as string,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_ID as string,
		SALES_PERSON_TYP as string,
		SALES_PERSON_TITLE as string,
		SALES_PERSON_FIRST_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_LAST_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_SUFFIX as string,
		SALES_PERSON_EMAIL_ADDRESS as string,
		SALES_PERSON_PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		SALES_PERSON_PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE as string,
		SALES_QUOTA as string,
		SALES_PERSON_BONUS as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		SALES_YTD as string,
		SALES_LAST_YEAR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TaxSource
source(output(
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		STORE_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubStore1
TaxSource select(mapColumn(
		Store_ID = STORE_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> taxIdselect
taxIdselect derive(HK_ = md5(Store_ID),
		Load_date_time = currentDate(),
		Rec_src = 'HUB_LOAD') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, HubStore1 exists(storeIdselect@Store_ID == HubStore1@STORE_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SatHubExists
SatHubExists sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		STORE_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		STORE_ID = Store_ID,
		HK_STORE_ID = HK_,
		LOAD_DTS = Load_date_time,
		REC_SRC = Rec_src
	)) ~> Hubstore
